instruction: Analyze the message content to determine if it requires an urgent phone call response. Return 1 if the message indicates urgency, emergency, or requires immediate verbal communication, otherwise return 0.

roles.name: urgency_detector
roles.description: Identify messages that contain urgent language, emergency situations, time-sensitive requests, or complex discussions that would benefit from direct verbal communication

roles.name: call_necessity_evaluator
roles.description: Determine if the message type and content would be better handled through a phone call rather than written response, considering factors like complexity, emotional context, and immediacy
